rows.label: qst712101_msg0001
rows.name:
Haha, we meet again! These are the
ones who were skilled enough to pass
my test, Roli!

rows.label: qst712101_msg0002
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]Meh-meh-meh...
This not good... Not good at all...

rows.label: qst712101_msg0003
rows.name:
So, are you signing us up for this
dangerous mission of yours?

rows.label: qst712101_msg0004
rows.name: Yes, about that...

rows.label: qst712101_msg0005
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]*Meep!* M-m-m-must think
of excuse, quick-fast!

rows.label: qst712101_msg0006
rows.name:
You've seen what we can do.
What else do you need?

rows.label: qst712101_msg0007
rows.name:
O-one time more! N-n-need one last
test to make extra-doubly-triply sure
friends have what it takes!

rows.label: qst712101_msg0008
rows.name:
...Well, you heard the 'pon.
Sorry, he's the boss.

rows.label: qst712101_msg0009
rows.name: This is getting somewhat irritating...

rows.label: qst712101_msg0010
rows.name:
This will be absolute final test!
Swear on life of Gororo! Is evaluation
of all skills up to now!

rows.label: qst712101_msg0011
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]Nngh, come on Krogane, throw
Gororo bone here...

rows.label: qst712101_msg0012
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Think ]Wait-wait! Gororo have it!

rows.label: qst712101_msg0013
rows.name:
Ten Fusion Combos!
Need to pull off at least that many,
or is no-go for employment!

rows.label: qst712101_msg0014
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]Yes! That was stroke of genius!
Now to give up please! Walk away!

rows.label: qst712101_msg0015
rows.name:
Heh. You know what? That actually
sounds like it might be fun.

rows.label: qst712101_msg0016
rows.name:
I hardly need to explain this to you,
but a Fusion Combo is essentially a
combined Blade and Driver Combo.

rows.label: qst712101_msg0017
rows.name:
You can add in a Blade Combo during
an active Driver Combo, or vice versa.
Whichever works.

rows.label: qst712101_msg0018
rows.name:
Like before, you can pick the place
and the target. Find somewhere you
can make the most of your abilities.

rows.label: qst712101_msg0019
rows.name:
So this final test in effect comprises
everything we've been examined on
to date...?

rows.label: qst712101_msg0020
rows.name:
All right, we'll do our very best to
prove our skills to you!

rows.label: qst712101_msg0021
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]Meh-meh?!
They...actually take bait...?
Inconceivable!

rows.label: qst712101_msg0022
rows.name:
Meh-he-hem! Is glad to hear. Once
team finish ten Fusion Combos, report
back to Gororo on quick-double!

rows.label: qst712101_msg0023
rows.name:
This will be the final test of your
abilities. Don't disappoint us now.
